about_the_game:
CardTD is a top down tower defense game, with a playful art style, and deckbuilding mechanics drawing inspiration from games like Dominion.

Unlike many card games players build their deck throughout the entirety of a level, purchasing the cards from an in level shop. However players can modify the card pool of this shop through ingame earned booster packs. Providing a lot of decision making and customization for players in how they will attack the challenges of each level.

Features!
  • Four worlds to play through with diverse themes and gimmicks.
  • Nearly 90 different cards sorted into 9 distinct booster packs and 1 base set.
  • 3 mechanically deep characters to spice up goals and gameplay.
  • 7 unique towers with three different tiers apiece.
  • Hordes of unique and themed enemies for each world, with a boss for each world.
  • A progression system that allows players to play the game at their own pace.

short_description: CardTD is a hybrid tower defense and a deck-building game. Packaged with a ton of user freedom in playstyles with a progression system that lets you play at your own pace. Defend your base from waves of toybox like enemies by playing cards to gain resources and towers to defend yourself!
